title: 820-00165 Trackpad and keyboard not working
message:
Board looks clean but had some work done before looks like, the trackpad and keyboard work sometimes, even multiple days at a time, but sometimes it doesn't, today it is not working mostly.

Tackpad, flex and keyboard are new, but I also tested with a different trackpad and cable and same probem.

U4810 [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]1: 2.8V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]2: 3.2V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]3: 0V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]4: 0V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]5: 0V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]6: 0V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]7: 0V[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]8: 2v

I replaced U4810 but same thing.[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
  [LEFT] [/LEFT]

title: 820-00165 Trackpad and keyboard not working
message:
"[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]8: 2v"
Are you really sure???[/FONT][/COLOR]
Replace U8000, just in case.

"[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]1: 2.8V
------------
5: 0V"
How is this possible???[/FONT][/COLOR]

title: 820-00165 Trackpad and keyboard not working
message:
The new U4810 I put was slightly moved and it was covering pin 5
Here are the new voltages [LEFT]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]U4810 [/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
 [COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]1: 2.9V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]2: 3.2V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]3: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]4: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]5: 2.9V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]6: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]7: 2.1V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]8: 2.1V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]

And after replacing U8000

[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]U4810 [/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]1: 3.3V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]2: 3.2V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]3: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]4: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]5: 3.3V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]6: 0V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]7: 3.3V[/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit][FONT=inherit]8: 3.3V

This MBA should be all good now!

Once again thanks![/FONT][/FONT][/COLOR]
